dc_description_s: These point datalayers show the level of crime statistics by colleges and universities in Massachusetts for the years 1980-2003. This data is Uniform Crime Reporting (UCR) data. Colleges and universities contribute data voluntarily, therefore not all colleges and universities have data and not all colleges and universities have 12 full months of data. These layers can be seen in State Police OLIVER (SPOLIVER). This data is collected by the Massachusetts State Police.
